column2:
symbol
  1. p, pp; symbol or abbreviation of صَفْحَہ (ṣafḥah).

character
  1. The thirty-fifth letter of the Urdu alphabet.

name
  1. Aban, the eighth month of the solar Persian calendar.

noun
  1. (literary) sunshine, sunlight, sunbeam
  2. (literary) heat (of the sun)

column2:
noun
  1. ease, simplicity, convenience
  2. an instance of above; an easy thing

noun
  1. sky
  2. (Islamic cosmology) celestial sphere, firmament; one of the seven heavens

adj
  1. sky blue
  2. of or relating to the sky; celestial, heavenly

adj
  1. strongly attached to
  2. fond of, enamoured of, addicted to, devoted to, intent on, engrossed in
  3. zealously following or pursuing

noun
  1. evil spirit, demon, apparition
  2. ill-fortune, calamity
  3. illness, madness
  4. trouble, pain, shock

column2:
verb
  1. to increase (in amount or intensity)
  2. to grow, become larger (in size)
  3. to rise (e.g. price, temperature)
  4. to develop, advance, progress
  5. to flourish, thrive
